about_the_game:
SUMMARY

Shred zombies in slow-mo while drifting with your good old tractor?! Harvest crops, slaughter zombies, overcome epic boss fights and upgrade your vehicle. Rinse and repeat.

FEATURES

  • Harvest crops
  • Kill zombies
  • Watch out for your fuel level. If you run out of fuel, you lose
  • Upgrade your vehicles
  • Engage unique boss fights
  • Fight your way through different seasons and weather conditions
  • Endless mode where you can kill thousands of zombies through endless waves and upgrade your vehicle on the go

STORY

Your grandpa left his farm to you when he passed away, and you gave him the promise to keep the farm in good shape. After the zombie apocalypse, you take your good old tractor and protect your farm from zombies.

HARVESTING


  • Harvest your crops to earn coins
  • Different crops provide different amounts of coin.
  • Prevent zombies from damaging your crops.

TONS OF UPGRADES


Use your coins to upgrade your vehicles
  • Faster vehicles
  • Sharper turns
  • Better drifts
  • Bigger harvesters
  • Tons of guns including mortars, flamethrowers, and homing missile launchers!
  • and many more!

EVERYONE HAS A DIFFERENT TASTE


Hit, shred, or shoot the zombies. It's all up to you, all that matters is to kill those damn zombies and protect your precious crops! As a bonus to protecting your crops, enjoy the satisfying ragdoll zombies flying around when you hit them.

EPIC BOSS FIGHTS


Oh boy, she's really mad at you! Engage unique boss fights and bring all you gut to take them down!

SHOULD YOU BUY?



How many of the following 10 suit you?
  • Short, fast-paced action game
  • Drive various vehicles and drift around with them
  • Shoot and kill massive amounts of zombies
  • Satisfying gore death effects like limbs, blood flying around
  • Ragdoll zombies
  • Various vehicle upgrades
  • Little storytelling, much gameplay
  • Funny boss abilities like the pregnant boss throwing her babies at you
  • Dark humor
  • Disinfect zombies with your flamethrower


8-10 points:
You are gonna love this game.

5-7 points:
I can still confidently suggest this game. You can focus on the things you like most. There is an endless mode where you can skip the harvesting, focus on the meaty part and kill thousands of zombies through endless waves and upgrade your vehicle on the go. You'll have a pretty good time.

3-4 points:
Maybe wait for a discount if you want to try it out.

If you like 0-2 points:
Sorry, this game is not for you.

THANK YOU!

If you decide to purchase a copy, thank you, I hope that you'll enjoy it.

content_descriptors.notes: The dismemberment of body parts and blood.

name: Shred-A-Bunch!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4460 or AMD Ryzen 3 2300U
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 or AMD RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 8600K or AMD Ryzen 5 3600XT
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 Super or RX 5700XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Shred zombies in slow-mo while drifting with your good old tractor?! Harvest crops, slaughter zombies, overcome epic boss fights and upgrade your vehicle. Rinse and repeat.
supported_languages:
English*, Turkish
